sentences.en: a coherent account of the incident
sentences.cn: 对该事件条理分明的陈述

sentences.en: A particularly troublesome type of multiple produces the coherent noise known as singing.
sentences.cn: 一种特别伤脑筋的多次反射引起同相干扰,这种干扰称为鸣震.

sentences.en: And it formed part of Aristotle's much larger, coherent system of thought.
sentences.cn: 而且,它们是亚里士多德更大的 、 更连贯的思想体系的一部分.

sentences.en: Can you look back and see a well-defined path, or simply an aimless series of job moves with no coherent structure?
sentences.cn: 回顾过去时能看到一条清晰的轨迹，还是只能看到一连串毫无目的、前后不连贯的工作经历？

sentences.en: He appeared hardly capable of conducting a coherent conversation.
sentences.cn: 他好像连话都说不清楚。

sentences.en: He has failed to work out a coherent strategy for modernising the service.
sentences.cn: 他未能制定出一条连贯的策略来实现服务的现代化。

sentences.en: He's so calm when he answers questions in interviews. I wish I could be that coherent.
sentences.cn: 他如此镇定地回答了访谈中的问题。我希望我也能那样有条不紊。

sentences.en: His interpretation is coherent and intelligible.
She had felt there was something wrong, but couldn't give coherent reasons.
sentences.cn: 她感到有些不对头, 但是讲不清楚理由.

sentences.en: The intensity of the coherent light builds up very rapidly.
sentences.cn: 相干光的强度迅速地增大.

sentences.en: The material must be moderately coherent and firm.
sentences.cn: 材料必须有适度的粘着力和坚固性.

sentences.en: The radiation is produced by the coherent motion of electron streams.
sentences.cn: 辐射产生于电子流的相干运动.

sentences.en: The three years of the course are planned as a coherent whole.
sentences.cn: 这三年的课程是作为连贯的整体来安排的。

sentences.en: The two photons go off together as coherent radiation.
sentences.cn: 这两个光子一起发射出去,形成相干辐射.

sentences.en: These five sentences run together as a coherent whole.
sentences.cn: 这五句是一气贯注下来的.

sentences.en: These two paragraphs are not coherent enough.
This coherent speech was interrupted by the entrance of Rochester coachman.
sentences.cn: 洛彻斯特驿车的车夫进来打断了这番有条理的演说.

sentences.en: Unnecessary variation is the enemy of a coherent, usable design.
sentences.cn: 不必要的差异是可用且一致的设计的大敌.

words.tran_cn: 连贯地；前后一致地；条理清楚地；互相偶合地；凝聚性地
凝聚；结合；[力] 内聚力

trans.tran_cn: 有条理的，清楚易懂的，有表达能力的
trans.tran_en: (of writing, ideas, etc.) easy to understand because it is clear and reasonable
